use-unix-time.description: Use UNIX time instead of day-offset time.
use-unix-time.tooltip: Enable this to show seconds since the UNIX epoch.

use-decimal-point.description: Show seconds separated by decimal point
use-decimal-point.tooltip: Enable this to show seconds separated by a decimal point.

clock-precision.description: Amount of digits after the decimal point.
clock-precision.tooltip: Change this to set the number of digits after the decimal point.
